products.name: DEFY SKYLINE SKELETON
products.description: DEFY Skyline Skeleton in a 41mm steel octagonal case with a faceted bezel, featuring a black open dial revisiting the emblematic ZENITH four-pointed star. Powered by the El Primero 3620 SK high-frequency automatic manufacture skeleton movement with the very first 1/10th of a second indicator. Interchangeable steel bracelet and black patterned rubber strap.
products.function: Hours and minutes in the centre. 1/10th of a second counter at 6 o'clock

products.name: Rolex Submariner Date
products.description: Rolex Submariner Date in a 40mm stainless steel case with a unidirectional rotatable bezel and black dial with Chromalight display. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3235 movement with a power reserve of approximately 70 hours. Oyster bracelet with Glidelock extension system.

products.name: Zenith Chronomaster Sport
products.description: Zenith Chronomaster Sport in a 41mm titanium case with a ceramic bezel and gradient blue dial with three different colored counters. Powered by the El Primero 3600 automatic movement with a power reserve of approximately 60 hours. Titanium bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Tissot Seastar 1000 Chronograph
products.description: Tissot Seastar 1000 Chronograph in a 45.5mm stainless steel case with a black dial and unidirectional rotating bezel. Powered by the Swiss-made ETA G10.212 quartz movement. Stainless steel bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Tissot Seastar 2000 Chronograph
products.description: Tissot Seastar 2000 Chronograph in a 45.5mm stainless steel case with a black dial and unidirectional rotating bezel. Powered by the Swiss-made ETA G10.212 quartz movement. Stainless steel bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Tissot Couturier Powermatic 80
products.description: Tissot Couturier Powermatic 80 in a 39mm stainless steel case with a black dial and date display. Powered by the Swiss-made Powermatic 80 automatic movement with a power reserve of up to 80 hours. Stainless steel bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Tissot T-Touch Connect Solar
products.description: Tissot T-Touch Connect Solar in a 47mm titanium case with a black dial and LCD touch screen. Powered by the solar-powered ETA E32.001 movement with a power reserve of approximately 6 months. Titanium bracelet with a folding clasp.
products.function: Time, date, alarm, chronograph, timer, compass, barometer, altimeter, weather

products.name: Tissot PR 100
products.description: Tissot PR 100 in a 39mm stainless steel case with a black dial and date display. Powered by the ETA F06.111 quartz movement. Stainless steel bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Tissot T-Classic Everytime
products.description: Tissot T-Classic Everytime in a 42mm stainless steel case with a silver dial and date display. Powered by the ETA F06.111 quartz movement. Black leather strap with a buckle clasp.

products.name: Tissot Le Locle Automatic
products.description: Tissot Le Locle Automatic in a 39mm stainless steel case with a silver dial and see-through caseback. Powered by the self-winding caliber ETA 2824-2 movement with a power reserve of approximately 38 hours. Comes with a black leather strap with folding clasp.

products.name: Rolex Submariner No Date
products.description: Rolex Submariner in a 40mm stainless steel case with a unidirectional rotatable bezel and black dial with Chromalight display. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3130 movement with a power reserve of approximately 48 hours. Oyster bracelet with Glidelock extension system.

products.name: Rolex GMT-Master II
products.description: Rolex GMT-Master II in a 40mm stainless steel case with a bidirectional rotatable bezel and black dial with Chromalight display. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3285 movement with a power reserve of approximately 70 hours. Oyster bracelet with Easylink extension system.

products.name: Zenith Defy Classic
products.description: Zenith Defy Classic in a 41mm titanium case with a black sunray-patterned dial. Powered by the self-winding Elite 670 SK movement with a power reserve of approximately 48 hours. Titanium bracelet with a double folding clasp.

products.name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore
products.description: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore in a 42mm titanium case with a blue dial and 'Méga Tapisserie' pattern. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3126/3840 movement with a power reserve of approximately 50 hours. Titanium bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Zenith Defy Classic
products.description: Zenith Defy Classic in a 41mm titanium case with a blue dial and silver-tone hands and markers. Powered by the automatic Elite 670 SK movement with a power reserve of approximately 48 hours. Blue rubber strap with a titanium folding clasp.

products.name: Zenith Chronomaster Revival A385
products.description: Zenith Chronomaster Revival A385 in a 37mm stainless steel case with a brown gradient dial and white sub-dials. Powered by the automatic El Primero 400 movement with a power reserve of approximately 50 hours. Brown leather strap with a stainless steel buckle.

products.name: Zenith Defy Classic Blue
products.description: Zenith Defy Classic Black & White in a 41mm ceramic case with a black and white dial and silver-tone hands and markers. Powered by the automatic Elite 670 SK

products.name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Selfwinding
products.description: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Selfwinding in a 41mm stainless steel case with a blue Grande Tapisserie dial. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3120 movement with a power reserve of approximately 60 hours. Stainless steel bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Selfwinding
products.description: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Selfwinding in a 42mm titanium case with a blue dial and Méga Tapisserie pattern. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3126/3840 movement with a power reserve of approximately 50 hours. Blue rubber strap with a titanium pin buckle.

products.name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Double Balance Wheel Openworked
products.description: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Double Balance Wheel Openworked in a 41mm pink gold case with an openworked slate grey dial. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3132 movement with a power reserve of approximately 45 hours. Pink gold bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.name: Audemars Piguet Sea
products.description: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Double Balance Wheel Openworked in a 41mm pink gold case with an openworked slate grey dial. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3132 movement with a power reserve of approximately 45 hours. Pink gold bracelet with a folding clasp.

products.description: Rolex Daytona in an 18k yellow gold case with a champagne dial and black subdials. Powered by the self-winding caliber 4130 movement with a power reserve of approximately 72 hours. Oyster bracelet with Easylink extension system.

products.description: Rolex Yacht-Master in a 40mm Everose gold case with a black dial and rotatable bezel. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3235 movement with a power reserve of approximately 70 hours. Oysterflex bracelet with a folding Oysterlock safety clasp.

products.name: Rolex GMT-Master II
products.description: Rolex GMT-Master II in a 40mm Oystersteel case with a black dial and black and blue ceramic bezel. Powered by the self-winding caliber 3285 movement with a power reserve of approximately 70 hours. Oyster bracelet with Easylink extension system.
